modName: Feminine Running and New Dash Animation
summary:
- Replace vanilla running forward animation to a MORE GIRLISH way. 
- Including new animation! Dash animation has been released!! Check it out. 
v1.1 Now with Breast\'s Bouncing Motion
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11447-1-1331532248.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]pic uploaded by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1512599]Atomic weasel[/url][/center]

[center][color=pink]When it say feminine, I mean it. You may experience the image of girls next door was running while worrying whether she have broken nails at the moment alduin trying to catch on her back.[/color][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i232.photobucket.com/albums/ee231/Asahina-Mikuru/Mikuru%20-%20Gif%20Animados/thmikuro.gif[/IMG][/center]

[center][color=\"#FFFACD\"][size=\"7\"][font=\"Comic Sans MS\"]UPDATES LOG[/font][/size][/color]
=============
Hi, I\'m back! New update files added. 
for ppl who want their own PC animation should look into [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]

[b]Feminine Running Animation for Female Human v1.1 (NEW!)[/b]

[color=orange]- Skirt Issues Fixed[/color]
- Including 4 directional Animation [Forward-Strafe, Left-Right.
- Recommended with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XPMS[/url] - tested[/center]


Skyrim Sprinting Animation v0.3 
- This anims has same style as momodash but less slanted or has same axis with vanilla

Momo Dash v1.1 (NEW!!!)
- Don\'t You dislike ape\'s sprinting style? Neither do I
- Spread legs? No way!!
- Added effect from Opticshooter modified by me [optional].
- What is the effect? I couldnt put it to word, there are dust and spark effeck when sprint, thats all

- Footsteps sound issues Fixed.
Increasing Sprinting speed is recommended to get better experience!! Use this to increase it:  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1603]Skyrim Speed[/url] and increase Sprinting\'s speed {+[5%-10%]}



Previus update log can be found in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/readmes/Feminine%20Running%20forward%20and%20New%20Dash%20Animation_readme.txt]Readme[/url][/color] 


[center][youtube]q4ZxOv9gs64[/youtube][/center]
[youtube]kxB6pKE0qBs&[/youtube][youtube]OJwXeLE8TGI[/youtube]
                                                                                                                                         Momo Dash v1.1 Run and Dragon
[size=\"7\"][font=\"Impact\"]Video Momo Dash[/font][/size]
====================
[url=http://www.youtube.com/embed/bT786pZoZn8]Momo Dash v1.0[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/v/YA5oIMgOloU&]Momo Dash V0.9 uploaded by gianama[/url] [Add Link to Sprinting mod effect: \"Eat My Dust\" at the youtube adress
[url=http://www.youtube.com/v/glRStkDOHjs]Feminime Running v0.5[/url] (thx for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1328757]gianama[/url] for uploading it)
[v0.7f is better than the one on video]

[url=http://www.youtube.com/v/eCeAa43Hots]Feminime Running v0.7f[/url]
Note 3: thx for someone who would upload their video for me, :p [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1328757]thx to gianama[/url]

[size=\"7\"][font=\"Comic Sans MS\"]NEXT UPDATES[/font][/size]
=============
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13272]Victoria\'s High Heel Walk for female human[/url]
 
Note 1:
You may try v0.5 before new one.
edit: on second thought v0.5 is a history.

[center][IMG]http://i169.photobucket.com/albums/u227/NejiHana/Gifs/ththth9c6cf92588cdf8cbedfebd21bcba.gif[/IMG][/center]
I plan to mod every character animation but I may think about it again. When I make this mod, realize Bethestda did good work on the spine and lower parts but the upper part isn\'t. The center of gravity betwen right and left isn\'t right so I change it and actually it costs a lot of work. In the end this mod far from perfection.
Works well with ANY body types. Don\'t know if there is a new types of bodies that incompatible reported.

[size=\"7\"][font=\"Comic Sans MS\"]INSTALLATION:[/font][/size]
=============
Install or extract to Skyrim installation folder (it\'s replace the animation mt_runforward.hkx)
files should be located at [code]\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\female[/code]

[center][youtube]EaytQzYZ6Kc[/youtube][/center]


Note 2: No Footsteps? bug problem came from :
EDITED: just found it recently, hkxcmd that convert kf to hkx are somewhat doesn\'t exported an extra \"key\" to implement footsteps. This issues actually has already solved.

[size=\"7\"][font=\"Comic Sans MS\"]Credits[/font][/size]
=======
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2171250]Opticshooter[/url] for his Eat My Dust mod

[size=\"6\"][font=\"Comic Sans MS\"]Recommended Mod[/font][/size]
==================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7416]Bowlegged jump animation fix[/url]

===============
Note 4:
Feel free to edit my custom animation, but please don\'t redistribute the original file.
( e.g. customized it so the butt or breast became bouncy but I\'m not the one who\'ll make it )

Want to endorse twice? give me kudos instead, some hint ;p >> How to give kudo to me
open [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=183089]xp32[/url] then click medal icon (below thumbnail icon) at the middle right of your browser. 

Thank You
by xp32
